column2: First ever Whitecoin summit in Shanghai, China on December 10th 2017.

The summit, which will be held in Shanghai on December 10th 2017, is the first community summit in China in the history of Whitecoin. The meeting marks that China is once again at the forefront of the world in leading the development trend of blockchain assets.

This summit we will invite the domestic and foreign heavyweight guests to the scene to share the Whitecoin, POS3.0, block chain investment and other areas. At the same time, the summit invited the majority of white coin Chinese community members, block chain enthusiasts to the scene to exchange, we will also open live broadcast to share the implementation of the meeting.
3 / F, Legend Plaza, 635 Bibo Road, Zhangjiang Hi-tech Park, Pudong New District, Shanghai
